content: readme.md preducstiny library(1.3kb) manage application state. supports interceptors(modifiers) handle modify data the fly.status to itcheck the tests folder usages, this is common usage.import createstore 'preducs';// create storelet store = createstore({ loading: true // data});// subscribe updateslet unsubscribe = store.subscribetoupdates((state) => { console.log(' got updated', state); // unsubscribe current listener unsubscribe();});// lightweight interceptor(modifier)const initialdatamodifier = (currentstate, newstate) => { return fetch('/api/endpoint') .(res => { return { ...newstate, ...res.json() } });};// update store, a call a apistore.update({ loading: false}, initialdatamodifier); that's it!instal npm install preducsyarn add preducs
